CREATE TABLE email_verifications (isotime BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, email_id VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, email_host varchar(64) NOT NULL, url varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (email_id, email_host))
CREATE TABLE users (uindex BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, uname VARCHAR(64) UNIQUE, email_id VARCHAR(64), email_host varchar(64), phone_no VARCHAR(16), logged_keys_json MEDIUMTEXT,PRIMARY KEY (uindex))
CREATE TABLE userdir (uindex BIGINT UNSIGNED, cred_json MEDIUMTEXT, small_dp MEDIUMBLOB, medium_dp MEDIUMBLOB, max_dp MEDIUMBLOB, user_page LONGBLOB )
CREATE TABLE articles(uindex BIGINT UNSIGNED, rate BIGINT UNSIGNED, catagory BIGINT UNSIGNED, url char(10), title varchar(128), description_json MEDIUMTEXT, raw_data LONGTEXT, html_data LONGTEXT )
